name: Avoid (itch) (Raynilar)
description:
This is a story about a person who is unable to get out of his daily routine. Level is a vicious circle, from which you cannot get out. Switch colors to avoid obstacles and adapt to conditions that get tougher with each playthrough.

CONTROLS

move : a / d /arrows

 jump : up / space

colours: 1 / 2 / 3 / 4
